author: Jennifer Peltz, Jennifer Peltz
title: Coronavirus: Two New York cats test positive for Covid-19, marking the first confirmed cases for US pets
description: The animals had mild respiratory illnesses and are expected to recover
content:
Two pet cats in New York state have tested positive for the coronavirus, marking the first confirmed cases in companion animals in the United States, federal officials said Wednesday.
The cats, which had mild respiratory illnesses and are expected to recover… [+3545 chars]
